mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facilities ( facilitiesNumber, facilitiesName, facilitiesAddress, facilitiesDetailAddress, facilitiesPhoneNumber ) VALUES ( facilitiesNumber_seq.nextval, #{facilitiesName}, #{facilitiesAddress}, #{facilitiesDetailAddress}, #{facilitiesPhoneNumber} )

INSERT INTO facilitiesEvaluation ( facilitiesEvaluationNumber, facilitiesNumber, memberId, facilitiesReview, facilitiesStar ) VALUES ( facilitiesEvaluationNumber_seq.nextval, #{facilitiesNumber}, #{memberId}, #{facilitiesReview}, #{facilitiesStar} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM facilitiesEvaluation WHERE facilitiesNumber = #{facilitiesNumber} ORDER BY facilitiesReviewDate DESC
